_instructions: Copy this file to 'ai_config.json' and add your API keys
_security_note: NEVER commit ai_config.json to version control - it contains sensitive API keys

setup_instructions.step3: Replace YOUR_GEMINI_API_KEY_HERE with your actual key
setup_instructions.step4: In MistEngine: AI Menu > Configure API Key
setup_instructions.step5: Press F2 to open AI assistant
